Text: Thank you for taking the time to upload the torrent.   As you can see you have peers wanting to download it, but nothing will happen until you seed it first.   You must leave your bit torrent client running and your machine connected to the NET until over 100% of the file is out there in the swarm.   Thank you.  Rigmar Radio
Still no seeder on this one, guess they forgot to hang around.  I have cancelled my download request and suggest the remaining peers all do the same.
